name: Boom Lift Simulator
summary: Boom lift vehicles offer a safe and effective way for workers to access heights of up to 150 feet while eliminating the need for ladders or scaffolding. The boom lift platform can hold multiple workers and transport substantial materials to high elevations. These adaptable machines are suitable for indoor and outdoor use, including on irregular terrain, making them indispensable in construction sites, industrial settings, warehouses, and commercial properties.
